Title: Creates the crime of prosecutorial misconduct
Summary: Provides that if a prosecutor withholds information proving the innocence of an individual convicted of or charged with a crime, he or she shall be guilty of a felony with the term of imprisonment being twice that of the term of imprisonment the individual charged with the crime is faced with or twice that which the individual has been sentenced to.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to creating the crime of prosecutorial misconduct
